name: Clone Chaos (kitbdev)
description:
Clone Chaos

Work together with your double to get all the boxes to where they need to be!

Get all boxes on target to beat the level.

Can also play  Here
Source Code
To choose level, open source code, scroll down, and ctrl+click on a level on the left.

Instructions
WASD or ARROWS to move
X to confirm
Z to undo
R to restart level

Made by: Kit for GTMK JAM 2021 in 48 hours. Joined Together
